data.persona: I am the king of this land.  I rule over everyone.  I make the laws.
data.description:
You are in the King's Bedroom.
The more-than-king-sized bed is the dominating feature of this room.  It has four tall posters, draped in the most royal blue canopy that you could imagine.  The inner curtains of the canopy are made of the finest silk his artisans could get their hands on.  Next to the bed is a lavish desk piled high with books.  On the other side of the room is a fireplace and a chair, and yet another pile of books.  [The King is an avid, AVID reader.]
There's a more-than-king-sized bed, a chair,, a desk, a book, an a rabbit fur coverlet, an a chamber pot, discreetly hidden, and a royal blue canopy here.
The a chambermaid and the the king are here.

You are carrying a cape, and wearing a crown and a belt.

            "desc": "The more-than-king-sized bed is the dominating feature of this room.  It has four tall posters, draped in the most royal blue canopy that you could imagine. On the other side of the room is a fireplace and a chair, and yet another pile of books.  [The King is an avid, AVID reader.]",

data.short_motivation: I want to greet the visiting king
data.mid_motivation: I want the visiting king to stay comfortably in the bedroom today
data.long_motivation: I hope to reach a truce with the king in the coming weeks
